headline: OMG They’re Back Again: T-Mobile Teams Up with the Backstreet Boys for Big Game Commercial
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., February 06, 2026--T-Mobile (NASDAQ: TMUS) is back in the Big Game for the 13th consecutive year — this time, with the Backstreet Boys to tell America why it’s better over here. Featuring the iconic group alongside cameos from Druski, mgk and Pierson Fodé, T-Mobile's Big Game commercial explains how when it comes to wireless, people don’t want it any way, they want it that way — with America’s Best Network, the best value and industry-leading benefits, all with T-Mobile.

content.title: OMG They’re Back Again: T-Mobile Teams Up with the Backstreet Boys for Big Game Commercial

Featuring the iconic group alongside cameos from Druski, mgk and Pierson Fodé, T-Mobile's Big Game commercial explains how when it comes to wireless, people don’t want it any way, they want it that way — with America’s Best Network, the best value and industry-leading benefits, all with T-Mobile.

thumbnail.caption: OMG They’re Back Again: T-Mobile Teams Up with the Backstreet Boys for Big Game Commercial. A reimagined “I Want It That Way” brings the Un-carrier's “best experience” to life, with appearances from Druski, mgk and Pierson Fodé to show why it’s better at T-Mobile
